line_1: And tracing careful, Note by Note, repays
line_2: The Shepherd, in his own harmonious Lays;

line_1: And, taught by her, your grateful muse repays
line_2: Her heavenly teacher in nocturnal lays.
The lofty column and the voice of praise

line_1: Yet verse (in all we can) thy worth repays,
line_2: Nor trusts the tardy zeal of future days; —
